headline: Assessing Kraft Heinz (KHC) Valuation After Recent Shifts in Investor Sentiment
summary: Kraft Heinz (KHC) has been grabbing investors’ attention recently, and not necessarily for the reasons you might expect. There hasn't been a headline-driving event, but the stock’s twists and turns over the past month have left plenty of observers wondering if something deeper lies beneath the surface or if this is just volatility as usual. Zooming out, the bigger picture tells a story of shifting momentum. Over the past year, Kraft Heinz shares have slid 22%, even with a small gain in the...
